name: A Way Out (itch) (quinnliu)
description:
The prologue of this prison escape game is based on a true story of the life of Cece McDonald, a black transgender woman who was assaulted and then put into jail after stabbing a man to death when trying to defend herself. 

Trigger Warning:

This game includes profanity and deals with topics of racism, transphobia, and sexism, as well as scenes of violence.
